a1: The tool supports MP4, WebM, MOV and most common video formats playable by your browser. The output is MP4 for maximum compatibility.
a2: Yes, the built-in video player lets you preview the entire video. Adjust the start and end sliders to select the portion you want to keep, and the player follows your selection.
a3: There is no length limit. The tool supports videos up to 500 MB. Processing happens in your browser, so longer videos may take more time depending on your device.
